website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek versatility when creating Halloween costumes, a Spandex-Lycra body suit is a good way to start. We recommend wearing undergarments for improved modesty.
pros: Can be worn by itself or as the basis for a more elaborate costume
cons: Visibility when fully zipped is limited
Material can be very sheer, especially "nude" color

customer_reviews.title: Sexiest onsies on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is thinner and more breathable than expected. And definitely eye catching. The purple one has an eye cutout of different fabric and the blue doesn’t (as seen in picture) and that wasn’t advertised on the product photo. Still wouldn’t do any dangerous activities with the hood on, like skydiving - but with the hood off, makes for a great free fly suit!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria J. Connell

customer_reviews.title: so good. Purchased a kids large for my 11 yr ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Purchased a kids large for my 11 yr old - 4'7" about 75 lbs, form fitting but roomy - Feet were a little long. The quality looks good. It has two zipper pulls on one zipper at the back that runs from the head to the lower back. He said he couldn't see well - but when I stretched the fabric at his face then he could see.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable to wear but my nose tends to get squished ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1 and 145 lbs and ordered a large. NOTE - This suit really hugs every single square inch of you, so be aware of that! It is very comfortable to wear but my nose tends to get squished a little bit by the part that covers my face. The face covering is ok to see out of, you can see shapes and lights and dark but not terribly much detail. The hands are spandex so the grip is not great for juggling and you may want to wear gloves for a better grip if that's your goal. Overall very pleased, this is a fun outfit that has gotten a lot of positive feedback.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews. They are good.
customer_reviews.text: The suit seemed to be great quality and very cool. Especially because the skeleton glows in the dark. Bought the large which is "perfect" for my size. But, I am 6' 1" and 160 lbs. The suit was slightly to small. If you need to zip and unzip with assistance, that is not happening. I returned my purchase. But the seller originally olny refunded me part of my purchase cost and I had to call Amazon. That was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool! I used this for Halloween going around ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool! I used this for Halloween going around with my kids. You cant see jack out of the material when its on your head. So I simply tucked it in and purchased sepertaly one of those skull masks that only covers my mouth and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely LOVED the costume
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely LOVED the costume, its glows a bright green and he thought it was was coolest thing. It doesn't have any logos or other markings besides the skeleton, which I appreciate. I saw some kids during Halloween with logos on their backs. My 8 year old son is skinny but long. He is about 56" and we purchased the Youth Medium. It fit him fairly snug but we have a really hard time getting his feet and fingers in. Afraid that the Large might have swallowed him but made it easier to take on and off and get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Prichard

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little girl who wants to be a skeleton for Halloween and maybe scare grandma. She loves the costume and has been trying to scare us at home. Love the costume. Great value and well made
customer_reviews.author: Julian Galaz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with our purchase and sized right
customer_reviews.text: Son is 5'8.5 and 145 pounds; purchased size Medium (black) fits great! If you're really wondering on size, there's a slight amount of wiggle room rather than snug. But again, fits great without sag and bunching. The fabric quality and workmanship is better than my expectations, considering some of the less favorable reviews. Remember, ours is black so other colors may be different but is sufficient color coverage (does wear dark compression shorts underneath). Zipper is strong, no weaknesses along the seams. "Suits" our needs for Halloween and mischief. As for the seller: arrived to our mailbox in just three days.
customer_reviews.author: Mary in KC

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make my daughter's Halloween costume with. Fits as expected, I ordered slightly large for her so she could use it even after Halloween. I was unable to glue plastic eyeballs to it due to the fabric type, but found foam stickers worked perfectly. She loved it and was able to see out the face part without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole H.

customer_reviews.title: I was really afraid it wouldn't look like the picture but it matched to a tee
customer_reviews.text: This costume is the bomb. Check the size chart and you should be ok. I was borderline between two size/weight combos so I went with the smaller of two and it was perfect--they stretch. I was really afraid it wouldn't look like the picture but it matched to a tee! The Silver REALLY is as shiny as shown in the picture! This is a big concern online since some of the other manufacturers don't match the material correctly to the pic. They delivered faster than many of the other distributors based in China, and worth a slightly extra cost for speed. Those sometimes can take a month to deliver, I paid extra to have it in 3-5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Perceptive

customer_reviews.title: Great fun costume.
customer_reviews.text: This costume was so much fun. Wore it to our annual Halloween party and then the next day down to our little town to see all the kids trick or treating. Managed to drink plenty of beer through it but you have to suck it through the material or else it dribbles down the front. The seams are all good and it fit well. (Size Large 6' 180 lbs). May buy a all gold one next year to be an Oscar statue and have my wife be an actress. Heck, I might buy it sooner and have an Oscar party!
customer_reviews.author: karen r hicks

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son for Halloween. Unfortunately, the bones began peeling off the fabric almost immediately, and the zipper broke before my son could even trick or treat. Also, the zipper runs up along the back of the head and easily catches hair inside. I had to cut my sons hair to get it off the first time he tried it on. Poor design and quality. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Avasmom

customer_reviews.title: My son was very unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up never using because it was too small. You should have better description for children sis’s
customer_reviews.author: Gjon Berisha

customer_reviews.title: The medium was VERY small/short so we returned it for a child's large which fits great. So in my opinion this runs about a ...
customer_reviews.text: The suit was as expected in terms of design. We originally ordered a child's medium which is what my son typically wears and what the sizing chart suggested based on his measurements. The medium was VERY small/short so we returned it for a child's large which fits great. So in my opinion this runs about a size too small. Overall we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mscott

customer_reviews.title: Seems used
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be used. The white parts have black streaks on them like it was washed and bled. Fingers were inside out like it had clearly been worn and pulled off. Teenager doesn’t seem to care and wants to keep it, but it’s a bit ridiculous for something new to be in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Skeleton Suit (XS)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the skeleton suit. It was a comfortable and easy to wear, and went over well on Halloween. However, it was difficult for me to keep the zipper up in the back. The fabric is see-through in the back, so plan to wear something underneath. The skeleton print is only on the front, which was kind of a bummer. The face is horrifying. I painted my face since I wasn't aiming to be super terrifying, and I found that it was easy to tuck the face into the shirt, and it didn't show any bulkiness. I found the sizing chart to be %100 accurate for me.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Order at least 1-2 sizes larger.
customer_reviews.text: It is tight. Ordered a men’s large for my 13 year old grandson. He normally wears a medium. But he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best stretchy full body suit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent weight. Durable enough for repeated wear. shiny like in picture. Great creature base. Unisex. The XL fit a 6'4 man with very wide shoulders, and a 6'2 man with 36" waist. Visibility is limited through the hood, but can be worn with the hood down. zips up the back for easy on and off. NO TEXT ANYWHERE unlike a competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great litlle costume
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 4 yr old grandson. He's average weight and height and the small was a bit big. But he LOVES this and his mom had a hard time getting him to take it off. It's well made and the glow in the dark feature is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: There is zero chance of my son seeing out of the mask. The glow in the dark works very well. But absolutely no chance of him being able to see with the face part on without cutting holes now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: This takes a bit of stretching
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you're planning with the suit, be SURE you have used the restroom before you zip up. This is NOT for someone who needs to use the facilities often.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ernest Scott

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Thin
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin material that is basically see through. Zipper is very poor quality and will not stay zipped of the suit is even just a bit tight. Would not purchase this product again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: WolfpackFan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who’s nine we got the Xs as he’s about 95lbs and in the in between size stage I probably should have gotten the small as this won’t last more than this season. The quality is great and has a decent stretch only thing I’d change is making the hood detach.
customer_reviews.author: chloe farley

customer_reviews.title: Great at first.
customer_reviews.text: This fit me like a glove. It looks really creepy on. I loved it until the shiny paint they used on it started flaking off only after wearing it once. So the long lasting of it isn't there. I don't know if I got a bad set or what, but it is flaking off with light use. I would recommend one that is dyed, and not painted like the Metallic Black one. It isn't hot while wearing it, and I can see fine in it unless in a dimly lit room.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mott

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like a nice costume just weird for a child
customer_reviews.text: The totally zipped one piece could be a neat idea, but for some it may feel a little weird or suffocating or claustrophobic. My son loved it, but each time we tried, he seemed to be a little panicky after I zipped it up all the way and begged to "get me out of this!" So I returned it. He was 5 yrs old at the time. Despite my child's reluctance, I liked it because it did appear to be a well made. No issues on the return. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small for my son who was just under the height requirement for the small. And, as to be expected, it's a little to big. But it fits with some room to put a light layer underneath. I do recommend that you give your kid a haircut before trying to zip the hood, it can get a little tight. It does glow which is awesome and there's room for him to grow because I know that he's going to want to wear it for a long time to come. I like it, and my son loves it. We put it on him as soon as it came in and he's still wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: See threw! Very tight and vision isn't good and I don't know how that's possible since you need to wear black under it
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go along with our “Kobra Kai” theme Halloween. It came quickly - it’s not sheer - it’s lightweight - and comfortable. I did expect it to be a little looser bc it was a men’s large. I’m 5’6” 145lbs. It’s not small but it certainly doesn’t have tons of room.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice but thin
customer_reviews.text: This was a great costume piece for my 10 year old son. It is thin and shows all the bits though...
customer_reviews.author: Ohwell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've used other socks for years but tried these researching Amazon reviews and they live up to the hype. Amazing for the price. I do day walking in woods and these are perfect: comfortable, long lasting, minimal sweat.
customer_reviews.author: B. DURAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and GREAT quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am a female and my body type calls for an XXS, but the XS fits like it was made for me. If you are in the weight and height range but have a more athletic figure, I recommend going a size up. The back zipper is perfect because the suit is ONE piece and allows me to wear a ponytail if I want. It is not too warm and I can see perfectly through the material over my face. For $30 and super quick shipping (3 days), this is one of the best purchases I have made yet. I bought the lime green one to wear to a college football game and it was a hit!!
customer_reviews.author: AGow

customer_reviews.title: zippers are crazy and don't like to stay zipped until their both together and at ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by the fit, it was just right, zippers are crazy and don't like to stay zipped until their both together and at the extreme end, top or bottom. I got this at a discount, I would have been upset if I paid full price as there are much higher quality suits out there for half of the full price. Buyer beware. Again, nice suit for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: wibfoot

customer_reviews.title: zipper broken
customer_reviews.text: Things to consider when you buy this suit: 1. Two zippers in the back are hard to close even after I rubbed petroleum jelly on them. 2. You won't be able to go to a Halloween Party and drink with this suit on 3. You can hardly see through, breathing is not easy either. Buy something else with your $60.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good zentai, not so good zipper
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Thin, but durable. Comfy, fits well (size chart was accurate). Material is breathable, did not impact my ability to breathe. I can even drink water while wearing it. Only downside: the zipper is loose. It doesn't stay up unless it's past my shoulders, so I have to really struggle to get it to close. But once I do, it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Undersized, but customer service made up for item shortcomings.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered five of these for a high school play production. Size is significantly smaller than chart states. Returned 4 of 5, had replacements shipped and were ultimately pleased with them. Vision is difficult in these, word of warning on that. Four stars for pleasant correspondence and replacements. Product is probably a B/B- overall, but customer service is vg.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than Morph Suit brand
customer_reviews.text: My son got this suit and went T&Ting with two friends who both had the official Morph Suit brand...whith just that emblazened across their butts! My son's (without the banner) was better quality, darker material (underwear didn't show thru) and had a better zipper and fit than theirs. This will be passed down to younger brother and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Awsome fit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. Bought for a gag dinner invitation and I was the hit of the party. Had a huge number of inquires as to where I purchased it, especially from the women who were interested in it for their men.
customer_reviews.author: M. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Poor zipper
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it but zipper broke 1st time wearing it. I bought it one size bigger so he had a little grow room didn't expect the zipper to break so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume
customer_reviews.text: Really love the costume. I am about 6 ft and 160 lbs, followed the size chart on the vandue site and went with a size large. Fits great, it stretches a little after you first puts it on, so it was a little tight at first. Only thing I don't like is the inside of the suit is white, so it shows through a little. You can't see very well through the material.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Will be good for event . parade featuring old time xmas toys
customer_reviews.author: Louise Yates

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: ok so i ordered a medium. too small. tried a large. it fit the same way as a medium. wtf?? they're literally the same size?
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to see out of
customer_reviews.text: I'm small, 5'4 and slender but it fit. It just didn't stretch across my face tight enough for me to see properly out of it and because I have an Asian face, the material was right on my eyeballs so I had to wear glasses under the mask so there was some clearance to blink and stuff. If you have a big head and inset eyes, you might have better luck seeing out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Feiya Wang

customer_reviews.title: Cool Item
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars, however, I purchased a dark color, it looks so cool, however you cannot see where you are walking. I feel, if you ordered a lighter color, maybe you can see better. It is exactly what it looks like, cool material and great quality, It would last years of wear, only problem, I couldn't see threw it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Skeleton suit
customer_reviews.text: This was great! I got the extra small, based on the reviews. I should have gotten a size bigger. I am 5'5" and 130 pounds. It needed to be a bit taller. It really smashed my face flat, making it hard to blink. That being said, it was a BLAST to wear!! I LOVED it! It is very sheer, so wear your underpants!
customer_reviews.author: Debby McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: was great, though pretty thin
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 and a half feet and 110 ish pounds and it JUST fit him. Otherwise, was great, though pretty thin. He wore black long johns underneath to keep warm.
customer_reviews.author: A Petersen-McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Too easy.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" 175# with a muscular build. Going off the height or weight on the size chart didnt work. It had me at a small. Too small, too short, too tight. Would have ripped out in no time. Company [Vandue] shot me out a medium in 2 days with a return label. Medium is just right. Too easy.
customer_reviews.author: William Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying this over Morphsuits because of the low reviews about seams ripping and poor quality, but I am SO HAPPY I chose to buy this. Not only is it cheaper, but shipping is fast! The material is fairly thick, which is nice to keep you warm but not sweating. I wore this on three different occasions and it's been a hit every time! I'm 6'1" around 180 lbs and the Large fits perfectly. Seeing is slightly limited but that is expected when putting someone over your face. Drinking through its a challenge at times but definitely do-able. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Fit pretty good. Little tough to see through. Had to get it positioned just right
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: My Bryce is amazing! ! !
customer_reviews.text: Love it! ! ! My son's a sophomore in highschool and wanted this for spirit week at school! He looks awesome in it! ! ! Go Bryce! ! !
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE G.

customer_reviews.title: COSTUME CONTEST WINNER
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old won 2nd place for this costume :) He lived in it for about a week LOL
customer_reviews.author: massagetherapistnc

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: The costume is good but it honestly looks like it was used. The pictures are of the inside of the mask. Some type of brown stains on the inside and outside of the mask part.
customer_reviews.author: American

customer_reviews.title: Fit great. I got a medium and I'm 5' 7" ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. I got a medium and I'm 5' 7" with a lean/medium build. Higher quality than I expected for around $20.
customer_reviews.author: A. Birnie

customer_reviews.title: but it was great for daytime/bright light use
customer_reviews.text: It's harder to see through the fabric than we expected, but it was great for daytime/bright light use. As others commented, it's quite see-through. I would recommend some tight fitting running pants under the suit.
customer_reviews.author: tat411

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed grandson
customer_reviews.text: Ordered XS and it is HUGE!! Cannot see out the eye holes, unsafe to wear. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: A fair value Skeleton suit
customer_reviews.text: Suit was smaller than expected, no bones on the back, but it was one of the cheapest decent quality skeleton suits I could find, the glow in the dark is pretty cool, still glowing after I've owned it several months.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L

customer_reviews.title: It is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The bodysuit fit loosely but it was see through. The description said nothing about glowing in the dark and it does. I could have gotten a suit at a local shop just like it that glowed but my son didn't want it to glow. The zipper was broke upon arrival so my son didn't even get to use it for our church Halloween party.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Beware!! Very very VERY see through. Unless you order a few sizes up and layer, this shows every little thing. Well made, just way too shear.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: I modified mine a bit for a cosplay costume. The material is great and non see through. It fit as exspected as well (ordered a medium, I'm 5"8 130lbs) and the color was lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: Good material, sizing was right. Perfect for this years Halloween outfit.
customer_reviews.author: LingLang

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously disturbing Halloween costume. Just be aware that it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Hilariously disturbing Halloween costume. Just be aware that it's, uh, very form fitting in the groin. You may want to wear compression shorts or something underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Humayun

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Neat costume but the sizes are very small, order big.
customer_reviews.author: jlv

customer_reviews.title: No hiding your rolls or goods in this suit, but it is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! amazing! this was a huge hit! they only downside is that you really cannot see out of it once you are zipped up. I had to cut a hole out for my face. but the fit was perfect. Be warned...you can see EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Ger'

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to scare the living crap out of someone with this
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4 1/2" and I weigh 180 pounds. A small fit perfectly. I can't wait to scare the living crap out of someone with this!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: SecondSkin Full Body Spandex/Lycra Suit
customer_reviews.text: I choose the highest rating because the suit was for my son to wear to a tight and bright party and it was a total success. It fit him perfect, he added orange sunglasses, orange tie and black and orange running shoes. The only thing that he did not like was that it did not have a hole where the mouth was, made it difficult to drink. I would recommend this suit to anyone that has the body or guts to wear something that tight. I am sure he will be wearing it this summer at a few more parties, at the cottage or at another house party. It was lots of fun. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: 29 inch waist so this is a bit snug for me but i like it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost 5'7, 29 inch waist so this is a bit snug for me but i like it anyway. it helps me with my Milhouse cosplay and for the cost i can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Morita

customer_reviews.title: Torn at zipper
customer_reviews.text: Torn at zipper while dressing for Halloween trick or treating. Guess my son got the trick. Or was it me that got it because I paid 40 bucks for a costume her couldn’t wear. You’ve been warned, it’s garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy News

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was an overall good buy, but the thing that sold it for me was the shipping speed. If you are on a tight schedule and this soon buy it. I think they ship form California. I live in Alaska and it got here in 4 days, including Sunday,and there is no postal service on Sunday,so it is more like 3 days.If you are in a rush don't worry about the shipping.(Also the white one is pretty see through from the outside, not a problem if you plan to wear something over it but I thought you might want to know.) good buy definitely get it! (I am also his son)
customer_reviews.author: sonaps

customer_reviews.title: Just fit wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a men's body suit, it can definitely fit women well. My suggestion is go for height first, and then weight. It fits perfectly!! It's somewhat difficult to see through the material (I chose white) but it's plausible, you just have to get really close to whatever you're trying to look at. Just fit wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Just like a SecondSkin.
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected using the SecondSkin size guide. Bones glow-in-the-dark, I don't remember the description mentioning that.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Chism

customer_reviews.title: I like the dbl zipper tabs so he can unzip as ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what he wanted. I like the dbl zipper tabs so he can unzip as he likes. The measurement on sizing made it easy to know what size to order.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Overall sizing was good. ( I am 6'0")My only complaint is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall sizing was good. ( I am 6'0")My only complaint is that it is really hard to see through the eye section of the costume...very difficult in low light conditions. I genuinely scared some people and the glow in the dark part of the costume worked great. For maximum glow just be sure to expose the costume to a strong light source for a few hours before you use.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a costume and customized it. It worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Teja McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It fits very well. It looks great. Quality is as expected. The zipper and seams are built well. It's very shiny for those exhibitionists out there. Love this one.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Well this was better than I could have hoped. I was prepped to cut the mask part off, but because zipper runs up over the head, I was able to just tuck the face into the neck. Their sizing is VERY accurate, so follow the chart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This is the second one I've purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Audra D.

customer_reviews.title: Slimmed Myself Down
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was one size. It fit it just showed a bit much. Pretty good though but I am on the bigger side somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: Davin Smith

customer_reviews.title: awesome product for the money
customer_reviews.text: wore this bad boy to prom, got kicked out but it was more than worth it. I'm 5 foot 6 inches and pretty fit. it fit me perfect. don't expect to see much through this thing.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Solid material and fit
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, nicely made, and arrived on time. My son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Loose zippers
customer_reviews.text: The metallic finish wears off very quickly, making it look 'patchy'. The zipper won't stay up unless the hood is over the head and also closed - that's ok unless you want to take a short break from being half-blind, then the whole thing opens up. Apart from that, it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping is a blast to wear really cool looking,.. (Bright colors kind of hard to see out of)
customer_reviews.text: I orderd the metallic green as I love green since I'm from the north west and a big Hawks fan. The shipping is outstanding. When you order if your in the middle of the size always round up that's what I did at first I thought it was too big looked a little baggy but when I put it on it fits great. It's hard to see out of the mask I wish they made it thinner but I can still see fine. Overall it is worth the purchase. I wear it to walk my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Mollison

customer_reviews.title: Hard to see
customer_reviews.text: Cute but very hard to see out of. I actually cut eye holes out.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son loved this. He is 5 foot 2 inches tall weighing 130 pounds. It would be too small for a larger person. It was almost tight on him but, looked really good.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, non-itchy material
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. I'm 6' and got the largest size. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Qu

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: was well package and delivery was great and fast. just in time for what I needed it for. No complaints. it fix great - just the feet was too big but able to tuck in shoes not an issue
customer_reviews.author: Paty

customer_reviews.title: happy with it
customer_reviews.text: my son loved it, he used it as his Halloween costume. he also plans to use it for making videos but hes not set up for that yet.
customer_reviews.author: erikad8303

customer_reviews.title: Last Resort Only
customer_reviews.text: This suit looks okay but it is really poor quality. What should look like the wrapping instead looks like lazy creases and poor printing. Most people couldn't tell what I was - defeating the purpose. My labored breathing due to poor ventilation in the mask did help sell the costume though. It also developed a rip in the right heel and on one of the hands after walking around for about two hours - no running, jumping or other crazy behaviors. I'm very disappointed in this suit and won't waste my money on others from this company. Perhaps another company has a more durable design?
customer_reviews.author: GoodManStew

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure how it would fit, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how it would fit, but it fit very well! Being so long legged, it's hard to fit my 5 year old grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun effect. Remember it's skin tight so can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as described. Really fun effect. Remember it's skin tight so can be a bit revealing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A

customer_reviews.title: It was for my 11 year old son for Halloween ...
customer_reviews.text: It was for my 11 year old son for Halloween. he weighs about 80lbs and it was a tight fit. The material was very thin but he was able to wear a tshirt/gym shorts under.
customer_reviews.author: aj143

customer_reviews.title: ... on time and fit/quality were as described and were perfect! My son wore the suit
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and fit/quality were as described and were perfect! My son wore the suit, after we customized it to his specifications, for Halloween. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowermomma

customer_reviews.title: The suit was great. But the face mask of it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The suit was great. But the face mask of it is not as good. The painted on skull is too small and hare to see through it even with cutting out the eyes. I ended up painting my face for a much better effect.
customer_reviews.author: Marek Skupien

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This second skin was everything we expected. Size was exact and it is a durable material.
customer_reviews.author: angry parent

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I didn't wear the hood that comes attached, I just tucked it in under my neck. The zipper will constantly unzip itself if you don't wear the hood, but a safety pin through the zipper fixes that. Overall pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, consider your height and not your weight!
customer_reviews.text: Just another example of a perfect fit: I ordered the Large suit and I'm 150 lbs and 6 feet tall. The suit is well done and with great material. I gave 4 stars only because the Pacific Blue color came out to be much more pale and less electric when I got the suit. Other than that, I really like it and can't wait to wear it on a special occasion!
customer_reviews.author: Yvosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but size beware
customer_reviews.text: I cant really compain about this product, it meets all it claims to. My only problem is that its a little TOO tight around the head. My nose is flattened to one side while wearing it. Perhaps if I stretch it for a few days itll fit better. Even with a shaved head its too small but the body fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zipper doesn't want to stay up. Also quite difficult to do yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon size chart does not match the size chart listed on this costume.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick L. Benenhaley

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Perfect for my seven year olds Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eddie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a Sunny fan, this is the suit for you! It is very form fitting. It's more like your first skin!! Just covers everything up! :-)
customer_reviews.author: MegB

customer_reviews.title: Good, but on the snug side.
customer_reviews.text: its a bit on the tight side. I am 6' 205, so I should be at the upper end of what a large fits, but feels somewhat see-through, since it is stretched thin. I might have gone with XL if I knew. Quality looks good, and you can see through it ok but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: AltSkin Men's Full Body Spandex/Lycra Suit
product_meta.description: AltSkin is a skin tight suit that covers the entire body. It originated from the Japanese term "zentai". AltSkin is made using lycra and spandex blends. It has a zippered back and is super stretchy to fit most builds. AltSkin comes in multiple sizes and colors including kids sizes. The skin tight feeling of AltSkin gives you an instant second identity that brings excitement. Each suit will instantly transform you into a new person. AltSkin is lightweight and breathable. You can easily unzipper just the head without having to remove the entire suit.
feature_bullets: VARIATIONS - Over 40 Fantastic Colors/Patterns to choose from including solid colors, prints, world flags and much more
ACCESSIBLE - Build with a zippered back which runs from the back of the neck down to the base of the spine for easy dressing and undressing
BREATHABLE - Made of durable and breathable lycra which is comfortable to wear for extended periods of time
STRETCHY - Made of super stretchy lycra to fit most builds with its forgiving fit. Select your size based on height for best fit
CUSTOM FIT - Available in 9 sizes including kid's sizes to get the right fit so you don't have a poor fitting skin suit
